channel.title: Please help this is impotant vista client problems!
channel.description: Hi im owner of a server and i uploaded a client to my server which runs fine on xp but my friend dled on his computer which is a vista and said it wont work the server is running no inbetrnet probs. PLeaasee tell what i can do to fix this .

item.title: Please help this is impotant vista client problems!
item.dc:creator: @nav56 nav56
item.description:
@nav56 wrote:

no
i changed it in the clients gui folder to my server ip

Read full topic

item.title: Please help this is impotant vista client problems!
item.dc:creator: @clowns clowns
item.description:
@clowns wrote:

In your clinet your ip might be 0.0.0.0 so you need to change it to your ip. then tell him to change it also.
